paper_abstract: For effective components, non-functional aspects must be added to application functional code. Likewise, enterprise middleware and component platforms, in the context of Grids, services must be deployed at execution in component containers in order to implement those aspects without modifications in the application code. This paper proposes an architecture for defining, configuring, and deploying such Technical Services in a Grid platform. (C) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Peer-to-Peer and fault-tolerance: Towards deployment-based technical services
